briefdescription.para: Writes a value to the writer with the given key.

parameterdescription.para: The key which uniquely identifies this value.
The value we want to write.

briefdescription.para: Writes a value to the writer with the given key, using the given type rather than the generic parameter.

parameterdescription.para: The key which uniquely identifies this value.
The value we want to write.
The type we want to use for the header, and to retrieve an ES3Type.

briefdescription.para: Writes a value to the writer. Note that this should only be called within an ES3Type.

parameterdescription.para: The value we want to write.
Whether we want to write UnityEngine.Object fields and properties by reference, by value, or both.

briefdescription.para: Writes a field or property to the writer. Note that this should only be called within an ES3Type.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the field or property.
The value we want to write.

briefdescription.para: Writes a field or property to the writer. Note that this should only be called within an ES3Type.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the field or property.
The value we want to write.
Whether we want to write the property by reference, by value, or both.

briefdescription.para: Writes a field or property to the writer. Note that this should only be called within an ES3Type.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the field or property.
The value we want to write.

memberdef.argsstring: (string name, object value, ES3Type type, ES3.ReferenceMode memberReferenceMode)
memberdef.name: WriteProperty

briefdescription.para: Writes a private property to the writer. Note that this should only be called within an ES3Type.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the property.
The object containing the property we want to write.

briefdescription.para: Writes a private field to the writer. Note that this should only be called within an ES3Type.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the field.
The object containing the property we want to write.

briefdescription.para: Stores the contents of the writer and overwrites any existing keys if overwriting is enabled.
Stores the contents of the writer and overwrites any existing keys if overwriting is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Whether we should overwrite existing keys.

memberdef.argsstring: (ES3Settings settings, bool writeHeaderAndFooter, bool overwriteKeys, bool append)
memberdef.name: Create

memberdef.argsstring: (Stream stream, ES3Settings settings, bool writeHeaderAndFooter, bool overwriteKeys)
memberdef.name: Create

parameterdescription.para: The relative or absolute path of the file we want to write to.
The settings we want to use to override the default settings.
The settings we want to use to override the default settings.
